one_reviews_text:
I love escape rooms and miss them a lot, and I'm also a fan of challenging puzzle games where you can click around, figure stuff out for yourself, think outside the box, try combinations of actions etc. Flow Weaver offers all of that set against a fantasy narrative of being magically bound by captors who want to learn about your (the MC) ability to Flow between worlds. 

The worlds all offer distinct moods and visuals which was nice, and once you understand the "layered" quality of how the worlds affect each other the cross-world object interaction possibilities open up. There were certain puzzles where I was totally stumped and had to look up the answer to, but once I did I felt silly for not noticing the hints, or 'thinking to try that'.

If you like the idea of a seated experience, and challenging puzzles then try this game out!

What a lovely puzzle game. It takes you to so many different whimsical worlds and has clever escape-the-room-like puzzles along the way. These types of games are the reason we bought a VR set! Can't recommend enough.

The game is great if you like puzzles and have afew hours to kill. If you get stuck on a part it's really worth it to keep going and makes you feel good. I personly love the game and can't wait to keep playing
